website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for smaller consumers or those who prefer a tight fit; otherwise, similar models we tested are better options.
pros: Features a compact design that folds without effort
Offers top-rated hearing protection at a mid-range price
cons: Though adjustable, the fit might be too snug for larger users

customer_reviews.title: Could hardly hear the kids yelling...
customer_reviews.text: Soooo... I had the Pro For Sho Earmuffs on my Christmas wishlist, my fiancée seen them and needed some as well so he added a pair to his wishlist :) I got him a pair for Christmas and he got me a pair for Christmas! We haven't used them for shooting yet but so far we are both pleased! I tried them on and could hardly hear my kids yelling on Christmas morning... haha... these may get used around the house more than at the range! ;) F.y.i. If you find that these are too snug place them over the box like I have done in my picture for a little bit to wear them in.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: Not working for sporting clays, but great noise reduction.
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are a mixed bag... While advertised to be designed specifically for shooting they totally get in the way when doing sporting clays and mess with your gun mount. I really don't think they work for shooting clays, but they might be fine for other shooting sports. On the other hand their noise reduction is great, even when I wear my sunglasses (which admittedly have a very thin titanium frame - other shooting glasses might not work as well). As one would suspect, your ears will get very hot and sweaty compared to wearing just ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I actually received them a few days ago and was able to use them at the shooting range yesterday. They worked great (although I double up on ear pro indoors). I had to stretch them out for a couple of days but the fit is now perfect. I followed the instructions and used the box they were packed in to stretch them out but I added a small 1 inch box last minute and that seemed to be the exact size I needed them to stretch too. I've tried other very fancy and expensive earpro and both the comfort and fit didnt work for me. These are perfectly! I highly recommend this reliable and affordable product!!
customer_reviews.author: Iloveagooddeal

customer_reviews.title: Better than the electronic ones!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about how well these would work. I have a pretty big noggin, and some people said they were too tight, but I can only imagine how big their heads must be. These extend nicely and are super comfortable. I didn't buy mine for anything other that to wear on flights, and I loved them so much, I bought my wife a pair of the light blue. The price is amazing for how well they work. Forget those $300+ electronic ones. I like these even more because I can use ear buds with them and get even less noise coming through. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what these are actually intended to be used for, but they block out zero noise. I usually wear earplugs, but they hurt after 8 hours, so I thought I'd give these a shot. Yikes, they are terrible. Uncomfortably tight and I have a small head. I can hear everything exactly the same volume, just a little distorted. Maybe they're supposed to block out only extremely loud noises? Well I tried that too, and they don't. Save your money, buy literally anything else.
customer_reviews.author: gonzotericagenda

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to wear but folds up quite compact.
customer_reviews.text: I gave the Pro For Shos a try (after having used Peltors for many years) since they fold up significantly more compactly, a big advantage when cramming into carry on. Unfortunately the cups on these are not large enough to be truly circumaural. Some of the padding will press against the earlobe for average sized ears, causing discomfort over long periods. +1 star for the compactness but otherwise unusable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Really tight - only for very small heads
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old, to protect his hearing when I'm using power tools in the yard. The style is nice, but they're so tight that he hates wearing them. I tried adjusting the band at the top, but they're still super tight. I think you have to have a size 6-1/2 head or smaller to wear them. My son's head is about a size 6-7/8 or 7.
customer_reviews.author: GemOfAGirl

customer_reviews.title: They work, but not a true 34dB of protection.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the price. However, do not be fooled by the 34dB rating. Hearing protection in a spectrum and it depends on different variables. Companies like 3M will provide an Attenuation chart showing the rating of their hearing protection depending on the Hz. For example, a handgun will give about 1000 Hz of noise. Which will be different then shooting an AR rifle. Don't just base the hearing protection off what the company states. Buy from a company that will provide their testing results. With that said, I used these at an indoor shooting range (shooting a 9 mm handgun) and they did a goo job with additional foam ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: luis pina

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed nothing compares.
customer_reviews.text: I work professionally as a diesel technician. In the trade I am in sound levels will easily break 120db. I have owned dozens of sets of ear plugs and ear muffs and out of all of them these work the best. Right out of the box they were more comfortable then any other and have a sound dampening capability of sets 4 times there size. I would highly recommend these for anyone in a loud trade requiring ppe. Also I wear them 9+ hours a day if that says anything about the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value - Very Good Noise Reduction and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the earmuff because I enjoy shooting and needed something that’s low profile to not interfere with my rifle aiming. The Pro For Sho (not that crazy w the name) earmuff did the job. I wear glasses and ear pads and overall muff fit well and is comfortable. The noise reduction is very good, though I don’t think it’s 34 dB reduction. The low profile worked well and not not hinder my aiming of the rifle. Overall I am very happy with the earmuffs and getting them for < $20 is a great bargain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good, multi-use product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son as he's now helping me around the house with some DIY projects. Working in semi small spaces we used an air compressor, framing nailer and ramset tool and he wasn't bothered at all. They are working fine for him and he says they're very comfortable and not annoying to have on his head. We also used them when I took him to the firearms range with me and the report was similar...no problems. They do the job at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: B Massey

customer_reviews.title: Not as noise cancelling as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who has a sensitivity to sound. For her they work just fine. When I wore them I felt like they didn’t cancel out the noise as much as advertised. They are compact and lightweight though. If you are looking for a pair of headphones to really “silence your world in a snap” these may not be for you. If you a looking for a pair of lightweight headphones that minimize outside noise then these will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McCauley

customer_reviews.title: but I’m really disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews, but I’m really disappointed with this product. In fairness they’re recommended for shooting, but do not buy these for work with power equipment. I have 3M ear muffs that are rated for 25 dbs and they offer much much better ear protection. I wouldn’t buy these for anything else either because they are very small and very tight fitting. They’re basically child sized. The folding feature makes them annoying to put on your head compared to normal ear muffs and they’re very cheaply made. Nowhere near the quality of other brands in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: ... as these are to small and are kids sized like the pink peltors
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the reviews as these are to small and are kids sized like the pink peltors. Also imo no way they are 34db rated. I spent a few hours drilling a 4" hole in concrete with a dry core in a large hilti and it felt like a low frequency was passing right through these. How can they be rated 34db when the 3m peltor 31db are twice the size?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Nadler

customer_reviews.title: American company, American designed, High-Quality Ear Muffs - Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear muffs. The product is exactly as advertised. The noise reduction is phenomenal and it is comfortable to boot. This is significant, because I have a big head lol (24 inches). Compact design, yet fits perfectly. And the price - you just can't beat it. On a side note, don't wear them to ignore your loved ones (they do work really well,lol). Excellent quality at a low price. What more could you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. Passenheim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for shooting.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, regardless of their low cost. I bought a set about a year ago for mowing and they held up to weekly abuse being tossed around in a shed, pulled on and off, and generally used as intended. Last week I ordered 3 more sets to use for shooting and they did not disappoint. All 4 sets were comfortable and did not get in the way while shooting. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: phenryiv1

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First reviewed: 06/24/2020 Pros: - Lightweight, compact, and extremely comfortable. Cons: - No cons have been determined at this time. ***** As of right now, I can only review based on comfort and not performance as I have not used the product in a gun range. An update with images and a full review will be provided at a later time. *****
customer_reviews.author: geekman7

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little wierd
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job at noise reduction. It being a slimline design, it kinda sits on top of your ears instead of around them so you feel the foam in the cup against your ear. I would prefer a larger cup. Edit: Took it to the range last weekend where we were shooting 223 Rem, 22-250, and 338 Sherman. These muffs seemed to work better than some expensive Peltor electronic muffs that a friend had, although conversation between shots was much easier with the Peltors naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpin Jehosaphat

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I always had used those compressible soft foam ear plugs to protect my hearing when using power tools. They worked pretty well but we’re a hassle because I ended up inserting and removing them from my ear canal multiple times during projects. I thought I would give these ear muff style protectors a try and now wish I would have done it years ago. Not only are they much better at reducing noises than the ear plugs, these ear muffs are comfortable, convenient, and of high quality. I expect they will last for years. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Noise - Does Not Eliminate It
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for dead silence to eliminate all outside noises to absolute peace and quiet these will not do that. Not advertised as "noise cancelling" but rather "maximum hearing protection - highest NRR" you would still think these ear muffs would blot out more noise than they do. While I'm working from home I can still hear my neighbor blasting his repetitive loop of Golden Oldies in his yard and landscapers mowers and leaf blowers. If all you are looking for is ear protection to cut down high db noise but don't expect the sounds to be completely drowned out then these will work. Otherwise for complete quiet these will disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Pollara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Value
customer_reviews.text: I opened my earmuffs on Sunday and used them and was immediately impressed with how much noise these remove. I am very happy with them and 100% satisfied with them. I use them in woodworking and it almost eliminates all noise. I could barley hear my table saw cutting and they are very comfortable to wear also. Thank you and hope this helps you sell more of these Pro for Sho Earmuffs. Thanks again, Thomas Scranton
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Scranton

customer_reviews.title: Great shooting protection
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical because of the price. Went to the range with these today. I go to an indoor range and these worked great. Seriously reduced the noise of my 9 and the shooters around me. Great fit. No problem with them being too tight. Love that they fold up and easily fit into my ammo can...Will be buying another pair for the wife. Can't go wrong with these..
customer_reviews.author: Movie_Buff

customer_reviews.title: I like them but there are cheaper options that work
customer_reviews.text: They fit my small ears fine. But they are not built for bigger ears. They are somewhat shallow and the foam touches my ears but they do block out sound very well. I like them because they are a slim design. However, the build quality is not amazing so I deducted a star for the price/quality ratio. There's cheaper options out there that are just as good or better. I complain a little but I have decided to keep them since they fit me, are slim, and they do work well
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Lol, “34 db reduction”...
customer_reviews.text: Nope. I was lured in by the slim design, but you know how the saying goes...if it sounds too good to be true... Just because it’s printed on the box doesn’t make it so. These are nowhere close to 34db noise reduction. I compared this product to a couple of other hearing protectors I own (claiming 32 and 33 db noise reduction) and they were far superior. Returned this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: jbug

customer_reviews.title: They fold down into an easy package. My only problem is with fit
customer_reviews.text: I have put off writing this review because i wanted to make sure I had a clear picture of the performance. The Pro Fo Sho headsets work really well. I have no doubt they kill 34dB of the noise. They fold down into an easy package. My only problem is with fit. I have a 7 1/8 hat size and these headsets are tight. I jeft them on the box for two days to help stretch them out but they are still tight. I have tryed to bend the headband but no help. I like the performance but dont want to wear them for more than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Neutralizing Earmuffs; Excellent for Shooting Range
customer_reviews.text: Both Pro For Sho Earmuffs were received. My wife's pink earmuffs were used Friday at the shooting range and she loves them! My earmuffs came Saturday. I haven't been able to try them out yet on the shooting range, but I did (just for grins) wear them to mow the yard. Both earmuffs seem to be one of the best price/performance products I have ever bought (and I'm 77 years old)!!!! Thank you very much! Dr. Cecil A. Morris
customer_reviews.author: Cecil A. Morris Sr

customer_reviews.title: ClearArmour 141001 is Better
customer_reviews.text: This item ADVERTISES that it provides 34 dB hearing protection. BUT it CLEARLY does NOT provide as good hearing protection as the "CLEARARMOUR 141001 Shooting Ear Protection ... ." EVEN THOUGH the ClearArmour product advertises itself as providing no more than the same amount of hearing protection, namely 34 dB. Comparing these two products, the ONLY good thing about this "Pro For Sho" product is that it is relatively COMPACT, and therefore it LOOKS better when one is wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Godspeed

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs fit perfectly on my head and I had no problem with them getting too tight while using them. I like how they are slimmer than the average ear protection on the market, and they do great at reducing noise. I took these to the gun range and shot my .44Mag, .45 1911, and 9mm for over an hour and I had no issue with ears ringing afterwards. I would say these work much much better than the ear plugs I usually wear. All in all, there are a great product that have a sleek design and are set at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Branham

customer_reviews.title: Does the job..
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for target shooting and I have two of these. Works as advertised. It does make it harder to talk to others while wearing this, so if you want to pay a bit more, you can look at Electronic models such as this -
customer_reviews.author: VellsMaster

customer_reviews.title: It is not good for lawn tractors use.
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs cut out the high noise but amplifies the low sounds. Sound very loud pounding to my ears. I would not recommenced for lawn tractor use. My neighbor said that he heard very loud low end sounds also. A pounding boom boom boom from the tractor engine. It is as if the ear muffs enhanced the low frequency. I have to use it in combination with ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: They fit me just fine. Bought another pair for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought only 1 the first time to make sure they fit me. If not, I could give them to my wife and order a larger pair. They fit me just fine. Bought another pair for her. Then used them for a target shooting outing. They were comfortable and worked better than any others I've used so I bought several more so that everyone in the family had a good pair to use. I did stretch them over the box overnight to loosen them up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these ,I was thinking I would need to use earplugs in addition to the muffs but I did not.I had cars pulling beside me within a few feet of my drive and behind me and people talking and laughing and I could not hear anything while starting /stopping weed eating. I was so impressed.Warmer to wear than I thought they would be,but I do live in the south with 90% humidity and your ears are enclosed in the muff,but I can live with it for a few hours every few weeks while doing yard work to save what hearing I have left.
customer_reviews.author: Pookums65

customer_reviews.title: NRR34?  I do not think so
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of muffs that were low profile for rifle shooting. Everything else of this design type has a NRR in the low 20s, so I was skeptical but gave them a try. I found these to be not near the same protection as my larger NRR 34 muffs and these caused my ears to ring when shooting 556 outdoors. Plus the foam pads that surround the ears are much harder than any others I have owned and overall are not near as comfortable to wear as any others I have used. I really have no idea how these have been rated so highly by so many others.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality,  Price, & Best Customer Service!  5 Star Product
customer_reviews.text: These are every bit as good as others have said. They also came in a pair and just what my husband and I were looking for. They are priced EXTREMELY well, and also arrived very quickly. They are snug yet very, very, comfortable. One extra bit of customer service.... "Dave" from the company contacted me to ask how I like the product. He also explained the snugness is an important part of what gives these earmuffs their rating for 34db. These fold up and fit in my gun case, perfectly. I would, absolutely, recommend these to anyone to purchase. The price, the quality, and the extra customer service gives them MORE than a 5 star.... can we say 10?
customer_reviews.author: Uptown J.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for guitarists, too.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are tight, and yes these need to be stretched. That aside, these earmuffs will protect your ears in situations where you're exposed to continuous loud music or playing. Watch a Johan Segeborn video on You Tube, and you'll notice that he nearly always uses heavy-duty earmuffs while playing loud (or even not so loud) amps. However, if you need full-range, detailed perception at lower volumes -- if you need to hear conversation or if you're responsible for front-of-house mixes or something along those lines -- you might consider plugs that offer a bit less protection.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gnau

customer_reviews.title: Protect Your Hearing
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! I chose these for the level of protection (34dB) and the previous reviews. Having now used them at a busy indoor range, I can verify that they function very well. I did not experience the too tight feeling some others have reported. They fit comfortably right out of the box even over a pair of eye glasses and an additional pair of safety glasses. I wore them for over an hour and had no discomfort. The company seems to be very quality orientated and cares about delivering a quality product. One's hearing is very important and once you lose it, it cannot be regained. Take care of your ears. I highly recommend these Ear Protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: I know, there shooting head sets....
customer_reviews.text: And they really knock that sound way down, although you can still hear (somewhat) when someone's talking to you. And I know they need to be tight fitting, but when I have them on for any length of time, I'll sweat in them around the edges. Small price to pay for the excellent sound reduction.
customer_reviews.author: David Kory

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling effect does not work well at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find something that drowns out npise so I can do my college work in quiet. These do not cancel hardly any noise. I really hate giving bad reviews but this item does not work. I can still hear almost everything. I wanted to return this but unfortunately I have to pay a $5.99 fee even if I were to drop it off at the UPS store and brought the label for return in.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: 1 thumb up for ladies
customer_reviews.text: good small size, smaller ear muff than other brands, but the head band is not adjustable; for a 5'2" 150 lbs lady, this ear protector is just the right size. How I wish there is an adjustable head band for my son? It is too small for 200 lbs man. The head band piece is too tight that i cannot hear someone from snoring!. Best anti-snore ever; I found it! It is well, padded; Not at all painful to the ear. I am keeping it because; before this; nothing works anymore and i really need my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Grace

customer_reviews.title: wonderful noise cancellation and nice and snug fit on your head
customer_reviews.text: they really help with what they say they are going to help with, which is cancelling noise & protecting ears. WIN WIN. My son who has autism needs these and actually wears them so WIN WIN WIN WIN. I also enjoy them when the house gets a little noisy... i have a full house ;) heehee
customer_reviews.author: h03angel

customer_reviews.title: As good as any I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for woodworking and they work well for that, however... At the indoor gun range, I asked to borrow each of their ear muffs to test them against my Pro For Sho, which I've been using for a while. To my surprise, the Pro For Sho blocked more gunfire than all of their ear muffs, including their best-of-the-best $150 (which, to its credit, had electronic noise cancellation). I also use ear buds inside these at the range. I can still hear my kids when wearing these though :)
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my boys
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for monster trucks at the fair. My 2yo hated the loud monster trucks at the last fair so I knew I had to find better ear protection than I had. I ordered 2 pair of these for my 2 and 4 year olds. They fit great and we made sure to try them on before the event so they were used to them. They didn't complain at all and we stayed for the entire show.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great solid hearing protection
customer_reviews.text: These work great, stifle the sound, fit well and are solid. I wore these most of yesterday as I was on and off my lawn tractor. They fit comfortably and felt VERY solid. I did drop them a couple of times but they were unaffected. I don't have a lot of experience with this kind of safety gear, but I have broken a few headsets. They DEFINITELY stifle the sound which is great!! I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: C Wentworth R

customer_reviews.title: Great Earmuffs, Not Total Noise Cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Flexible, very comfortable, and cancels audio fairly well, but not even close to entirely. If you really need almost total noise cancellation, pushing against the back of your ear towards the earhole will work much better though it'd require both hands, maybe there's a type of earplugs that work like that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ear Protection!  Lightweight, Compact, Effective, and Well-Priced
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and COMFORTABLE! These fit my head and dampen sound without all the weight of other similar-rated ear protection. They fold up nicely into a compact little package and don't take up much room in the hunting pack. Nicely priced too! I strongly recommend these for the range or the field. I last took them out hunting at night in 85 degree heat with 80% humidity. Most times I am pawing my ear protection off my head in summer--can't stand the bulk and sweat. These were no issue. Pleasure to wear. What's the point of ear protection if you can't stand wearing it?
customer_reviews.author: Dogtired

customer_reviews.title: These things are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These things really work, like right now hold your hands over your ears and talk and hear your own voice, that is what these headphones do, that is how much sound is blocked, BUT, the awesome thing is you can still hear people talking. It lt blocks out high pitched noises like gun shots! It works great on the range and they are small and low profile. Had no problem with them when wearing a hat and eye protection. Good job Pro For Sho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonn Costumerr

customer_reviews.title: Useful in air travel
customer_reviews.text: I used it in the plane to block out noise. It helps to enjoy listening to a movie or sleeping without so much of the plane noise. You have to use another set of earbuds if you want a listening device. You also want to use the earbuds kind that is simple and plain, not those that has base that extends out of you earlobe as it will feel very uncomfortable fitting with the ear muffs. My ears were in pain from pressure of that extra bulky earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Less than 10db noise reduction.  Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 10db noise reduction on average. Bought this brand and another at the same time. Other brand claimed 30db reduction and scored 22db noise reduction. This brand claims 34db, I see less than 10db reduction. Blaitent marketing lies! I'm not one for imposing laws but there aught to be some oversight here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Ear protection
customer_reviews.text: Overall they work nicely. They are comfortable to wear and provides good overall ear protections. While at the range, normal handguns 9mm, 357, 45 380 , 40 size no issue. When people just some of the bigger rifles like AR-15 i wished it blocked just a tad more of the sound. Still nothing deafening or anything like that just a little higher DB protection would be better. This is the first time i bought them and still overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mikev

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Effective and inexpensive. They are tight and start to hurt my head after about an hour. These muffs excel with higher pitched sounds, but they struggle a bit with lower rumbles, bass, fan noises etc. Couldn’t sleep with them unfortunately. I probably would be able to on a plane because I bet it’d be worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Public name (required)

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ear Protection for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these since the day of purchase and they fit great and work well for the price. I was going to go for the one that you put a battery in and it does the auto sensing. After a few reviews I read they were bulky, uncomfortable, and, you had tor replace the battery a lot. I was not willing to get involved with any of that. I went for these and was very impressed and have suggested them to all of my shooting friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in library and house House since some recent construction has started and makes lot of annoying noises early morning. So this avoid all those noise for sure. This is also best for library. Its not bulky as others so it looks like headphone. You can not tell the difference since its slim and light. I wish they would have come with some carry bag but its fine. I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: AMAY SHANBHAG

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive equals cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so my son can do some woodworking with me. He has never liked the noise of power tools. He likes wearing these and they do cut down on noise. From my perspective, they have a really cheap feel. I guess for the price I cannot expect anything more.
customer_reviews.author: photo papa

customer_reviews.title: SURE MAKES MOWING THE YARD MORE ENJOYABLE
customer_reviews.text: THE DOG WAS BARKING WHEN i GOT THE PACKAGE. i OPENED THE BOX AS THE DOG KEPT BARKING ON THE DELIVERY, i FIGURED OUT TO GET THEM ON AND i COULDN'T HEAR THE DOG BARKING, ALSO MAKES MOWING THE YARD SO MUCH NICER, i KNOW YOU WILL BE AMAZED WITH HOW OFFEND YOU USE THEM
customer_reviews.author: Glen McBride

customer_reviews.title: literally best ear muffs I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: literally best ear muffs I've ever used. I really surprised how much of a difference these made, especially because they are so cheap. Only down side I can see is that they are not electronic, but you cant expect that at this price range. Some people say that its a little too tight for their head, but I haven't had any issues(probably because my head is kind of small. I heard that if you leave them stretched out overnight on a box or ball, or something, that they will fit your head better, but I haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable ear protection for the range
customer_reviews.text: These have kept my ears safe while using a variety of firearms at the range, from 9mm handguns and 5.56 carbines all the way to a Barrett .50 BMG. I like them enough that I even recommended them to a friend and they have worked very well for him, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Little snug but they have to be
customer_reviews.text: Overall they do a better than average job.. low profile design s good.. I have seen some reviews talk about that they are snug.. well they have to be. They are not so tight that they cause pain or fatigue We use them aa tbe gun range indoors.. and with large caliber shooting they are completely effective... after shooting 300 rounds and the crazy tourists shooting the maching guns and elephant guns .. no ringing.. total success in cutting that sound down... my girlfriend doubles up and uses foam in-ear protection and these muffs ... Be safe..
customer_reviews.author: vegas massimo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound deadening, but required some force to make them fit my head
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the earmuff set, they were very stiff. I tried to adjust the muffs for my head and the left muff came off the wire frame. I was able to put it back on, but it felt flimsy. The muffs don't stay adjusted, you have to adjust them every time you put them on. I was able to bend the metal band that goes over your head to loosen the fit better. They now fit well and don't crush my glasses as much--but they are still very tight. They kill a surprising amount of noise.
customer_reviews.author: JB Bednarcyk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work that well over AirPods
customer_reviews.text: The cups in these aren’t deep enough for wearing AirPods or Apple ear buds comfortably. I bought these to use over my AirPods for flights and though it kind of works they aren’t that comfortable. I am trying to stretch them and push in the foam inside the ear to deepen it to see how that works.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Stupid folding design, weird fit
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs have a strange hinge-type folding mechanism. It probably helps them stay compact for travel, etc, but when you're not wearing them they twist onto themselves. So if you want them to hang on something they're a mess. The hinge also makes adjusting them awkward and fidgety.
customer_reviews.author: GriffinDoor

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Took them out to the range and they really do lower the dbs quite a bit. It takes a little adjusting to get them to fit right, but once they're set, they do the job. I did wear them with some rubber ear plus for added protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shooting muffs.
customer_reviews.text: Great ear muffs for shooting. Comfortable, and do a great job of eliminating noise. I can still hear things around me, but the higher dB noises while shooting are damped nicely. I shoot smaller caliber 10/22 .22lr rifle and HK 9mm pistol and noise reduction was great at the outdoor range. The dB reduction rating of 34dB seems true compared to my other muffs. Definitely a good buy and they have a quality construction that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These items work as described and block sound very well. They are slightly snug when you first receive them, but clamping them to the box as described in the instructions helps alleviate that. They fit well and are very comfortable. I would not hesitate to purchase these again and would recommend them to others. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very good. All most mute the out side noise. fits well, compact at the time to storage. My interest is to bring it to the range field. But have no doubt it would stop the shoting sound. Like it and verey accecibility cost.
customer_reviews.author: Cjavyglez

customer_reviews.title: Impressive With Glasses combo paired with your wireless music headset of choice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, bought the glasses combo and will not look back. I can slip my earbuds in underneath to listen to my playlist of various tunes while the Amazon delivery guy can throttle drive up to my Woodworkshop, see me shaking buns, slam his door, deliver packages behind me so I can turn around and believe Amazon employs Ninjas when I heard none of that. Volume on music was like 2/10; couldnt even hear it without the Pro Fo Sho on.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Binar

customer_reviews.title: Fenway for youth!
customer_reviews.text: The description and reviews say these were too tight for some wearers but they fit well and no complaints from my thirteen year old which they were purchased for. They are fully adjustable and look like they will be a good set to grow with for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: I work in an extremely noisy factory and previously used the ear plugs you'd stick in your ear. This hurt me overtime and i was a bit sceptical about the headset brand. I read the reviews on this product and decided to give it a try. Even though its a bit tight probably because of initial use, it's much better than those ear plugs and keeps away the sound of the machines even much more. I'll highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product that does what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product that does exactly what it is intended to do. I visit a 15 lane indoor range at least once week. The range is usually crowded and calibers of all sizes are being fired almost non stop. These muffs do an excellent job of protecting my ears even when the guy next to me is firing off .44 or .357 rounds, and they do it at a fraction of the cost of the big name brands. They’ve been comfortable and effective. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jason from Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Well these aren’t my favorite but they work. Maybe not as great as everyone claimed but they get the job done. They are very tight and took a minute to figure out how to adjust them. You can still hear when someone talks to you it’s only a little muffled. I got these for my autistic teenager because fireworks scare him. We shall see how they hold up in a few days. They did however ship fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Call

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like the foam was hard and deformed causing a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: These Pro For Sho earmuffs were not very effective. It seemed like the foam was hard and deformed causing a lot of sound to leak by. The problem was made worse with glasses. I tried letting them sit out of the box for a few days and there was no change. Otherwise I had high hopes because they were very comfortable and roomy. I returned them to hopefully find something more effective in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katano

customer_reviews.title: Muffles sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drown out the noise of my co-workers. They help a lot, but I can still hear their conversations. I can’t wear them all day because they are a little uncomfortable. I realize these are not intended to block screaming people so I cannot day the ear protection does not work as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Tested, it works perfectly. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Tested, it works perfectly. 5 stars. I like it, they are thin anough to comfortable shoot from a rifle. Protection is aceptable for the indoor shooting range. Subjective opinion: my old headphones are better protects (the old one is bigger). Probably, because I wear optical glasses, it is a problem to make good sealing. But again this is my subjective opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Pjatkin

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing. The noice reduction was substantial
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed by this product, these are amazing. The noice reduction was substantial, the padding on them is extremely comfortable, almost felt like wearing nothing. The folks that own this company have followed up with me personally since I bought the product to provide info, service, and appreciation about their product. Incredible customer service. What a fabulous product and company, a pleasure to purchase from them. I would absolutely recommend this product. Very affordable, not huge, which is nice being a women, and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: really does block out noise well
customer_reviews.text: Blocks out TV noise in the next room . Comfortable on, however I haven't worn them for any great length of time, so am unsure on long term comfort. Be sure to follow directions , they will need stretching out , but it works and they stay stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: pool

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true...except they ARE true:  a MUST for shooters
customer_reviews.text: These ear protectors are INCREDIBLY GOOD. Price aside -- which is WAY too low for their quality -- these offer every bit of the 34dB noise protection level promised. They are very comfortable, accommodate many head sizes (mine's pretty big), and are durable. This is one of those finds that is special. (I'd say "too good to be true" except for the fact that they really do exist.) The manufacturer/seller is also very proactive and courteous. You've GOTTA get a pair of these if you shoot.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH M KRAUS

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonably priced, seems very well put together
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced, seems very well put together, a bit tight at first, but I followed the instructions and now it fits better. Excellent sound deadening, better than all the others I have, great follow up and service, I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend them specially over some better know brands that are more expensive and block out less decibels.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE A. TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Got for my 9 year old son who has autism .
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old son who has autism for school. Very sensitive to sounds. We love them . Just takes time for the snug fit to loosing up. So we followed the instructions you sent . Thank you! Wonderful caring seller ! Very happy customer : )
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: If only they were usable
customer_reviews.text: They work well against noise but they are hard for me to keep in a position to put on! They adjust individually with a springback that keeps one side higher than the other. The spring effect that keeps them travel-size is too much of an obstacle to give a good review. Putting them on my kids was a pain and it is a struggle to adjust the ears while the head cushion slides around loosely. :(
customer_reviews.author: romewri crew

customer_reviews.title: Work very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have tinnitus and I have to be very careful about working around noisy tools. Hearing loss is a cumulative thing. So it is important to me that 1 it reduces noise and 2 is comfortable. This reduces sound very well, better than my last pair. They are a bit snug but their recommendation to alleviate that helped. I find that holding it that firm against my head actually helps reduce the noise even more. For the money it is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Medengineer

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well this product did what it was required to do. The review I read from the range instructor caught my attention, so I ordered two pair of these. It was better than I expected. They are comfortable, fit well, adjusted perfectly. I would recommend this product. A very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little small for me
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in a timely manner. I also bought the ClearArmor 141001 hearing protector so I could compare the two. The ClearArmor seemed to fit me better and provide slightly better hearing protection. These were a little too small for me to be comfortable. For what it's worth my wife tried these and liked them better than the ClearArmor. She said the ClearArmor was too big and bulky for her. The bottom line I guess is head size. I wear a 7 3/8 hat so if you're like me these may not fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Phone Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Construction Noise
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs have finally given me some peace. I have 3 construction sites besides my home and the continuous drilling and hammering noises drove me to multiple migraines every day. Though the noises are not completely cut off, they are muffled to the extent that it wont bother you any more when you work or study. Just don't try to concentrate on them and you will be fine. You will still hear the train at a distance and will also hear what people are saying around you in a room. The fit and comfort is also good for a small-medium sized female head. My husband however found it to be very tight and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Anonym

customer_reviews.title: Nice ear protection
customer_reviews.text: These replace comparable ear muff protection from ClearArmor I had for the last 5 years. These are lighter and thinner but perform as well. They are perfect for shooting, mowing, chainsaw and more!
customer_reviews.author: BSM

customer_reviews.title: i like these over H
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pair. I had several given to me 30 PLUS years ago and felt it was time to upgrade for me and my guest. What a difference..glade I did. I may buy a few more at that price and start wearing while cutting my lawn. For the few dollars more over harbor freight it's a wise deal to protect your hearing.i like these over H.F. And compared to my buddy's. He had wish he didn't IMPULSE BUY and got these instead after our comparison. Over all great deal and compact
customer_reviews.author: picky buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with larger head sizes
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping that these will do a better job as I continue to work with getting them to fit better. Followed all the suggestions provided by vendor and the headband adjustments just dont seem to make it over my head. (lol) They do not seem to do so well dealing with the initial concussive sound of each shot at the range. But I am still hopeful that this will get better as the fit issue is resolved. As it is now the cheap bulky ones from my work do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tiponya

customer_reviews.title: Great earmuffs and not only for wearing when shooting...
customer_reviews.text: I had been using foam earplugs when mowing with a tractor (not a lawn/garden tractor) and those were not enough protection. Huge noise canceling difference with these ear muffs. Wish I'd bought them sooner! Snug fitting but comfortable. Very happy with these earmuffs. Was so pleased I ordered a pair for my daughter whose job is in the cargo area of a major airport. Even though they are marketed to wear when shooting they are great for tractor and jet engine noise, yet you can hear when someone speaks to you. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joan F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every possible way!
customer_reviews.text: & it gets the job done for me. Cancels out my neighbors' sounds in the apt complex. yet I can still hear my own tv, radio or music. However, can't hear anyone knocking at the door or the phone ringing. Nice, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tree V

customer_reviews.title: These muffs worked great, blocked the concussion from the muzzle blast and ...
customer_reviews.text: I RO our club's pistol matches and when we shoot under cover due to rain the blow back from ported barrels were hurting my ears when using foam ear plugs. These muffs worked great, blocked the concussion from the muzzle blast and ports. The reason I didn't use ear muffs were that midway through a match the pressure from the muffs against the frame on my temple would give me a headache, not these ears muffs. I was able to wear them through the whole match.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: Best lowest price value I found for the higher 34db ...
customer_reviews.text: Best lowest price value I found for the higher 34db rating ! • I was using my custom made ear plugs at a membership range, but at the pistol shooting range section the decibels caused my ears to ring; this was prevented once I put on the ear muffs over the ear plugs ! • same was true for the rifle range section from AR15 5.56 - 50 calibers !! • the profile tappers down for the cheek rest on my AR15 effectively enough; however there are other ear muffs more narrow for rifle cheek rest but at double the price, etc. I recommend these ear muffs for a quality budget purchase with the highest DB reduction rating !!😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No need to be quiet!
customer_reviews.text: When you must nap during the day you really need these ear muffs. They must be comfortable and light, these muffs are exactly what they advertise them to be. Thank you,just what I needed and at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Starbuck

customer_reviews.title: the best hearing protection i have used so far
customer_reviews.text: very nice. i have had several types of ear protection including the electronic kind and these do a great job at blocking out the noise. was not satisfied with the electronic kind, even thought they seemed to be more high tech. the quality of this item is done very nice. also note the design is sleek, not bulky. when my buddy is shooting next to me at the range, the electronic protection was not enough. i was flinching every shot he took a shot. these work great. highly recommend. you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PAH

customer_reviews.title: Noise isolation is not bad. Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Small. Noise isolation is not bad. Cons: Way too tight fit, especially if you wear glasses. While the noise reduction is not bad at 34dB, I find that my wife's Howard Leight L3 provide slightly better noise reduction even though they are rated at 30dB. I ended up getting the Howard Leight by Honeywell Impact Pro Sound which are just like the L3 but with added voice amplification. Even though the Honeywells are bulkier I find them much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SurfinBird

customer_reviews.title: just to see how well I could use them to shut out external noise while I work (software developer) - it was perfect! No lawn car
customer_reviews.text: These made such a difference at the range; my previous set was 26dB protection, and I found that I was always startled by large-caliber gunfire in the adjacent lanes. Not with these! At home, I tested them with a pair of wireless bluetooth earbuds, just to see how well I could use them to shut out external noise while I work (software developer) - it was perfect! No lawn care noise, no bumpy neighbors, just blessed focus. I love these - and even more that they're in colors other than black, pink or cammo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cancels Noise Well
customer_reviews.text: Have not been back to the range to test, but compared to my in ear setup currently and it blocks the noise out very well. Relatively comfortable, though not over the top. Price point makes these a great addition for those that need to cancel out the sound around them. Seem a bit snug, but sure will break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected from reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I expected from reviews. At least for me these do not muffle sound effectively enough for shooting, even outdoors. I still needed to wear earplugs underneath to lower the volume of shots below painful. I believe it is because I have an abnormally large head and the muffs did not sit low enough to completely seal around the bottom of my ears. However, they did lower the sound as much as larger muffs and did not interfere with rifle stocks.
customer_reviews.author: TyBuzz

customer_reviews.title: While great at reducing loud
customer_reviews.text: While great at reducing loud, percussive noise wearing them for extended periods of time is not comfortable for me. I recommend them for a female or youngster but not for a bigger guy. Yes, I did follow suggestions and stretched them over the box it came in and them a larger box for an extended period of time, they are still to tight. I'm going to have to find another pair that is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moody

customer_reviews.title: -34dB what can you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: Provides me at most -34 dB protection during vacuuming, hard loud noises from lawn mowing and during my times at a factory/workshop. It works well. Not recommended for sleeping :D I would use other sleeping methods for that.
customer_reviews.author: chanwenjin

customer_reviews.title: and also have a hard time focusing while listening to music - because of this it didn't make sense to purchase a nice pair of no
customer_reviews.text: I often get distracted by loud conversations at work, and also have a hard time focusing while listening to music - because of this it didn't make sense to purchase a nice pair of noise cancelling headphones, so I decided to go with noise cancelling earmuffs instead. What a great choice! These do a fantastic job of cancelling out sounds, while still being able to hear if someone is talking to me. When I put these on my concentration immediately increases, almost like taking adderall, lol. I also like the fact that even with the 34dB noise cancelling capability, these are not too large on your head (unlike some other brands). Highly recommend for shooting or for in the office!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Holewa

customer_reviews.title: Just the job!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the right product! It fits snugly, is well built (unlike those plastic ones that break too easily) and protects my hearing whether riding my tractor or lawn mower, or using high dB tools in my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Somersetman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound protection and comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because of the level of protection they provide. My husband and I both got a pair and we love them. The fit is great. For anyone having an issue about the fit, please take the time to read how to adjust them. I read both the email the company sent and the instructions that came with them. It was very helpful as we were worried if they would fit when we saw the size listed as small. Not a problem at all and my husband has a larger head. They offered great sound blocking when we were at the range. So glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pro For Sho 34dB Shooting Ear Protection - Special Designed Ear Muffs Lighter Weight & Maximum Hearing Protection
feature_bullets: 34dB – Highest Hearing Protection Ratio Earmuffs Help Silence Your World “ In A Snap ”
SOLID, LIGHTWEIGHT – Specifically resigned to address the limitations of conventional ear muffs
COMPACT & EASILY CARRIED – Perfect for carrying in bags without weight or bulk
Industrial Grade Ear Muffs Protect Your Hearing During Shooting, Hunting, Woodworking and Study

✭ SMALL SIZE: Young Child through Average Adult, LARGE SIZE: Average Teen to Large Adult | Looking for large size? Search " ProForSho Large Ear Protection " on Amazon ✭ - THE PRO FOR SHO PROMISE - 90 DAYS NO RISK MONEY BACK GUARANTEE and LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY
